name: @fooloomanzoo/color-picker
description: A picker for color, that can use the native input.

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "publish new version" && git push && npm version patch
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git pull && bower update -f && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.build: git pull && bower update && polymer analyze > analysis.json
